issue.title: tf::TransformListener() lookups always returning most recent tranform

content.raw: Nevermind, I found the problem. We had set up static transform publishers to remap from the X1 base\_link frames to compensate for an earlier issue, they were I think rendered obsolete with a recent ignition update, and must have been causing the transform buffers to clear due to multiple publishers.
content.html: Nevermind, I found the problem. We had set up static transform publishers to remap from the X1 base_link frames to compensate for an earlier issue, they were I think rendered obsolete with a recent ignition update, and must have been causing the transform buffers to clear due to multiple publishers.
